```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)

logs <- data.frame(read.csv("C:/Users/jpelt/Desktop/Datafest/SienaDataFest2022_TeamLigma/data/logs.csv", header=TRUE))
```

```{r}
  playtime_data <- logs %>%
  mutate(event_time_dbl <- as.numeric(event_time_dbl)) %>%
  filter(stack_id == 0) %>%
  filter(event_id == 204) %>%
  group_by(player_id) %>%
  summarise(exit_count = length(player_id))
```

``` {r include=FALSE}
hist(
  playtime_data$exit_count,
  breaks = 25
  )
```
